sourcesContent:
// pretty slug  →  backend cap tag
export const SLUG_TO_CAP: Record<string, string> = {
  'assistants-productivity': 'cap:text-explain',
  'text-writing':            'cap:text-edit',
  'images-design':           'cap:image-generate',
  'video-3d':                'cap:video-generate',
  'audio-music':             'cap:voice-generate',
  'business-marketing':      'cap:research-web',
  'coding-development':      'cap:text-explain',
  'automation-agents':       'cap:automate-workflow',
  'data-analysis':           'cap:research-web',
  'education-learning':      'cap:text-explain',
  'health-wellness':         'cap:text-explain',
  'specialized-niche':       'cap:text-explain',
};
